channel.title: Cache redirect? Path? Please Help! Client Loading Screen!
channel.description: Okay, I want to change the client background. It's in the cache on my c: drive. Now, I know how to change but how do I make it change for everyone? I was told to change the path but what path and where would that even be?

item.title: Cache redirect? Path? Please Help! Client Loading Screen!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

unless you use a launcher for your jar you will have to update it manually by giving out a new cache/client that downloads the cache…

Read full topic
item.source: Cache redirect? Path? Please Help! Client Loading Screen!
